title: Looking for Designbureau in London
content: I have to go on an internship this (school)year. I was thinking about going to London, but amazingly enough I can't seem to find that many. London is known for it's high concentration of design firms i believe. I've bought and looked into some books, but I was also wondering if anybody on this forum knows some good firms.
author: NapoleJon

comments.content:
check out the back of design week and creative review, most design mags tend to be a good place to start.

really depends on what you are looking for

good luck

Check out the nominees (and winners, of course) from the [D&AD awards](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019173822/http:/www.dandad.org/).  
They do tend to have a few Londoners as recipients.  
See if anyone suits you.

ƒ

Thanks to both.

@Balance.

I live in the Netherlands, and i've never seen the magazines you mentioned anywhere. I guess they're english, but i'm sure there are some other mags i can find that could be useful. Thanks again.

Any more suggestions are always welcome of course

_Design week_ and _Creative review_, as Balance writes, are excellent choices.  
If You've never heard or seen them, it's about time you did.  
And don't miss Creative Review's [blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019173822/http:/www.creativereview.co.uk/crblog/).
